an4.265:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.265:1.3: Attana ca adinnadayi hoti, paranca adinnadane samadapeti, adinnadane ca samanunno hoti, adinnadanassa ca vannam bhasati—
an4.265:2.1: Attana ca adinnadana pativirato hoti, paranca adinnadana veramaniya samadapeti, adinnadana veramaniya ca samanunno hoti, adinnadana veramaniya ca vannam bhasati—imehi kho, bhikkhave …pe….
